title: Trump scraps federal COVID-19 website for virus lab-leak theory
shortDescription: The White House replaced the federal government’s hub for news and updates on COVID-19 with a website saying the virus leaked out of a Chinese lab.

title: Trump: Carter died 'a happy man' because he wasn't 'worst president'
shortDescription: During an Oval Office meeting with the Italian prime minister, Trump shared his thoughts about former U.S. Presidents Jimmy Carter and Joe Biden.

title: IRS turmoil continues as Trump again switches acting commissioner
shortDescription: The shakeup reportedly stems from a clash between Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and Elon Musk

title: Trump leans into deportation fight he thinks he can win
shortDescription: The Trump administration has been eager to push back on criticism of how it is handling the Kilmar Abrego Garcia case.

title: Trump vs. Harvard feud escalates with search for foreign funding, ties
shortDescription: The Trump administration escalated its feud with Harvard University, seeking records on foreign funding going back a decade and on some foreign ties.

title: Trump administration publishes cache of RFK assassination records
shortDescription: Thousands of pages of records related to the assassination of Sen. Robert F. Kennedy were posted online in response to a Trump executive order.

title: Trump under pressure as the number of revoked student visas rise
shortDescription: With more than 1,000 student visas revoked nationwide, students, schools and politicians are pushing back.

title: White House reiterates claims that it will protect Social Security benefits
shortDescription: The White House says that it is aiming to reduce improper payments made by Social Security, but reiterated its claims that it would preserve the program.

title: Trump could walk away from Russia-Ukraine peace deal, Rubio says
shortDescription: President Trump's Russia-Ukraine peace deal push could end soon, U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio says.

title: Trump budget cuts hitting weather service hard
shortDescription: Many National Weather Service offices have seen staff reductions of 20% to 40%, limiting forecasting ability, especially in rural areas.

title: Why does Trump want changes to automatic birthright citizenship?
shortDescription: The U.S. Supreme Court will hear arguments in May on Trump's bid to enforce his executive order to restrict automatic birthright citizenship.

title: White House allegations against Kilmar Abrego Garcia in deportation fight
shortDescription: Until now, the administration had offered no evidence in court linking him to gangs, even when prompted by a federal judge.

title: Trump floats tariff revenue as replacement for federal income tax
shortDescription: In an interview with Fox Noticias, Trump also said he wants to give money and a flight ticket to undocumented immigrants who “self-deport.”

title: Trump defers to Department of Justice on Abrego Garcia case
shortDescription: Asked if he'd take steps to bring Abrego Garcia back to the US if a judge held him in contempt, Trump replied, "Well, I'm not involved in it."

title: Deportation politics: How Trump embraces drama around Abrego Garcia
shortDescription: A court ruled that the Trump administration wrongly deported Kilmar Abrego Garcia, but the president and his advisers have been defiant.
